name: Xylo in The Wasteland
description:
Play as a kind robot named Xylo as he and his ragtag group of robotic friends try to restore the barren earth to its former glory!

Music is created by Bgillick

NOTE

Make sure to double-check you're downloading the right file for the control scheme you wish to use, otherwise the camera will not work!

-If you want to play with a gamepad (Game Controller), pick the GAMEPAD file!

-If you want to play with keyboard and mouse, pick the KEYBOARD file!
